content: पारिजातः, पारिजातकः [ पारमस्यास्तीतिपारी समुद्रस्तत्र जातः, तस्य समुद्रेत्पन्नत्कत्] {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the five trees of Paradise (said to have been produced at the churning of the ocean and come into the possession of Indra, from whom it was wrested by Kṛṣṇa and planted in the garden of his beloved Satyabhāmā), कल्पद्रुमाणामिव पारिजातः <ls>R. 6. 6</ls>, <ls n="R.">10. 11</ls>; <ls n="R.">17. 7.</ls> {@--2@} The coral tree. {@--3@} Fragrance.
